title: Stopping McConnell's Midterm Sabotage with Kelly Tshibaka
itunes:title: Stopping McConnell's Midterm Sabotage with Kelly Tshibaka
description:
It's the most important midterm since the Civil War, and Mitch McConnell is spending $9 million defending RINO Lisa Murkowski to stave off Trump-endorsed conservative challenger Kelly Tshibaka. Tshibaka joins Charlie to dissect McConnell's motives and explain how voters can thwart Murkowski's desperate rank-choice scheme to maintain her family's political dynasty. Then, Charlie dives into comical audio of AOC being heckled for betraying her old antiwar positions and joining the rush toward World War 3.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
